## IAnonymousPaths interface

APIs for denoting paths as not requiring authentication

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAnonymousPaths 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isAnonymous(path)](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.ianonymouspaths.isanonymous.md) | Determines whether the provided path doesn't require authentication. <code>path</code> should include the current basePath. |
|  [register(path)](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.ianonymouspaths.register.md) | Register <code>path</code> as not requiring authentication. <code>path</code> should not include the current basePath. |
